author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Curbed tile shower tips…I tile the shower pan first. Then set tile on the main wall and side walls. I leave a 1/16 inch expansion joint between the floor and wall. That is filled with 100% silicone, not grout. If you’re tiling a shower check out our video library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tile #tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovations #diybathroom #diy
title: Curbed Tile Shower Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
